name: hystrix-dashboard
description: a UI part of java hystrix dashboard for nodejs apps

scripts.preinstall: rm -rf Hystrix && rm -rf webapp && git clone https://github.com/Netflix/Hystrix && cd Hystrix && git checkout d3e099121127dc9a2748c5d581794cd9e3867b6a && cd .. && cp -r ./Hystrix/hystrix-dashboard/src/main/webapp .

author: Dmytro Semenov <dimichsdg@yahoo.com>
